translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I received oral orders from the Most Excellent Sir Bento Manuel Ribeiro to send the prisoner Sezefredo Nunes to the brigade of Your Excellency, Sir Captain Fortunato Francisco da Silva, to serve in his post in the forces of the 2nd and 3rd districts, appointed by Your Excellency, Brigadier Bento Manuel, to go to the province of Corrientes to negotiate political matters with Lope Chico. The same captain says there are 50 horses of his consignment waiting for orders from Your Excellency.

God preserve Your Excellency

Barracks in Alegrete, December 16, 1837.

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Colonel Commander of the Right Division. José Inácio da Silva Abreu, Lieutenant Colonel Interim Commander of the Frontier.

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Colonel Commander of the Right Division. From the Lieutenant Colonel Interim Commander of the Frontier. Replied.
